media:group.media:title: Home Internet Connections Are Unfair
media:group.media:description:
Check out what you can fix with iFixit at https://www.iFixit.com/Techquickie

Even if you have a fast internet connection, a little-known phenomenon called bufferbloat often results in games lagging and video calls dropping. So what exactly is bufferbloat, and how do you fix it?

Waveform bufferbloat test: https://www.waveform.com/tools/bufferbloat
